statements: DELETE FROM advocacy_initiatives WHERE initiative_name = 'Social Campaign';
DELETE FROM milestones WHERE milestone_name = 'Launch Campaign';
DELETE FROM advocacy_initiatives WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND deadline > '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM milestones WHERE milestone_date < '2022-06-30' AND completed = TRUE;
DELETE FROM action_items WHERE completed = TRUE AND deadline < '2022-10-01';
DELETE FROM action_items WHERE status = 'In Progress';
DELETE FROM Milestones WHERE initiative_id = 3 AND actual_date IS NULL;
